title: Australia Post
summary: MyPost Deliveries – sync Watchlists across devices, find a post code and more
description: Get the Post Office in your pocket. Track and manage your deliveries on your phone, tablet or Android Wear, pay bills and much more...Features:• Track your important parcels – with notifications of estimated delivery dates and locations of parcels awaiting collection• Sign up for 24/7 Parcel Lockers to get your deliveries when and where it suits• Easily collect Parcel Locker deliveries using your phone or Android Wear• Request eligible signature-on-delivery parcels be left in a safe place (eligible parcels are shown in the app)• Quickly scan and pay your bills• Find postcodes when you’re out and about• Find nearby Post Offices and street posting boxes• Android 7.1.1 users can access our most popular features by long pressing the app icon
descriptionHTML:
Get the Post Office in your pocket. Track and manage your deliveries on your phone, tablet or Android Wear, pay bills and much more...

Features:
• Track your important parcels – with notifications of estimated delivery dates and locations of parcels awaiting collection
• Sign up for 24/7 Parcel Lockers to get your deliveries when and where it suits
• Easily collect Parcel Locker deliveries using your phone or Android Wear
• Request eligible signature-on-delivery parcels be left in a safe place (eligible parcels are shown in the app)
• Quickly scan and pay your bills
• Find postcodes when you’re out and about
• Find nearby Post Offices and street posting boxes
• Android 7.1.1 users can access our most popular features by long pressing the app icon
comments: The app has just advised me that soon I will have to upgrade my version of Android to keep using it. Not real happy about that as Samsung hasn't released an update for my Galaxy S2. Please make the app suitable for 4.4.2 and above.

This app is useless. It does not work. It worked off and on for a week when I first got it. But now all I ever get is an error:500 cannot connect with Aus post. I've emailed 3 or 4 times and heard nothing back. Crappy app with crappy support
I doalot of online shopping, so this app is really handy to have. I can tell when most of my packages are due for delivery.
Love using this to track my parcels, being able to enter a nickname, and getting push notifications when it's automatically added to my account!
Does everything I need a post app to do and More.
Has been a blessing as we are Mobil, so perfect for redirecting when needed.
recentChanges: •     Greater control over your push notifications with Notification Channels (Oreo 8+)
•     When you need to verify your mobile number the app now takes care of it automatically, with no need to type in an access code
•     Updates to your item details sometimes lagged behind your push messages – now they’re perfectly in sync
•     Fixed an issue using Smart Lock with passwords (Oreo 8+)
